text: @ Ina CSMA/CD network with a data rate of 10 Mbps, 1 the maximum distance between any station pair is found to be 2500 m for the correct operation of the collision detection process. What should be the maximum distance if we increase the date rate to 100 Mbps? A 25 m B.2500 m C.250 m D. 25 km goclasses2023-cn-1 [ goclasses computer-networks csma-cd 2-marks
